PAYMENT.WECHAT_2: 2. Enter the order id shown below in the payment note
PAYMENT.ALIPAY_1: 1. Please use Alipay to scan QR code to pay

PAYMENT.TRANSFER_TIP_2: Please be sure to note the order number on the payment page when transferring funds, otherwise the customer service cannot judge your order.
